content: {"name": "Operation D.E.F.R.O.S.T.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The location of the pantry is at the rear end of the building.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1136 Metropolitan Parkway Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Pittsburgh", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30310", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7239019, "longitude": -84.4075313}, "phones": [{"number": "(305) 305-1848", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
